name: Strategic Reserve
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Ningguang, equip this card.
After Ningguang equips this card, immediately use Jade Screen once.
When your Ningguang, who has this card equipped, is on the field, Jade Screen will cause you to deal +1 Geo DMG.
(You must have Ningguang in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1601]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1601] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16012]</color> once.
When your $[A1601], who has this card equipped, is on the field, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116011]</color> will cause you to deal +1 <color=#FFE699FF>$[K106]</color>.
(You must have $[A1601] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Ningguang</color>, equip this card.
After Ningguang equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> once.
When your Ningguang, who has this card equipped, is on the field, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Jade Screen</color> will cause you to deal +1 <color=#FFE699FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color></color>.
(You must have Ningguang in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Ningguang to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
